interface.name: loadkeys_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute the loadkeys program in the loadkeys domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: loadkeys_run
interface.summary: Execute the loadkeys program in the loadkeys domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to allow the loadkeys domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the loadkeys domain to use.

interface.name: loadkeys_exec
interface.summary: Execute the loadkeys program in the caller domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.
